function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Subnational governments managing PCAs may need specific support from national government.","Impact":"Disruption in the management of Protected Conservation Areas (PCAs) leading to biodiversity loss and ecosystem deterioration.","Mitigation":"Establishing clear communication channels and support mechanisms between national and sub-national governments to ensure effective management of PCAs.","Technologies":"Communication platforms and digital tools for efficient information sharing and coordination.","People":"Subnational government officials, conservationists, local communities.","Owner":"National government, international organizations, conservation NGOs."},{"Description":"The impact of donor funds can be enhanced through better access to information on funding opportunities and support for potential recipients in applying for funding.","Impact":"Inefficient use of donor funds due to lack of information and capacity to access funding opportunities, leading to ineffective conservation efforts.","Mitigation":"Developing online platforms and capacity-building programs to provide information and support for potential funding recipients.","Technologies":"Online fundraising platforms, educational resources, capacity-building tools.","People":"Conservation organizations, project managers, grant recipients.","Owner":"Donor organizations, conservation NGOs, financial institutions."},{"Description":"Funding primarily allocated for achieving sustainable development and climate change adaptation and mitigation objectives can have a substantial positive impact on PCA funding.","Impact":"Limited funding allocation for biodiversity conservation and ecosystem services, leading to inadequate protection and management of PCAs.","Mitigation":"Advocacy for dual funding allocation for both sustainable development/climate change and biodiversity conservation objectives to ensure balanced resource allocation.","Technologies":"Advocacy and lobbying platforms, data analysis tools for impact assessment.","People":"Conservation advocates, policy makers, funding organizations.","Owner":"Environmental organizations, advocacy groups, conservation NGOs."}]}
